clips.title: Candy Ultra Radio studio Rocketman intro
clips.action:
Candy is looking at papers. 
Leaning in, more intense, lips parted.
clips.dialog:
Candy: "Jack Parsons says he gets rocket plans from a spirit he calls in magic rituals.
Candy theatrical humourous: "I went to SEE Jack and he was having trouble with his neighbours..."

clips.title: Jack with wilted plant
clips.action: Candy holding a microphone interviewing Jack.Jack holding a pot plant that's been half eaten by a goat. Looking at it distressed.
clips.dialog:
Jack strokes the plant. 
Jack: “The goat next door ate it.”
Jack looks at the plant and says: 
“Do what thou wilt.”
The plant dies and Candy looks theatrically awkward.
Jack says "Say hello to my gardener Fritz"

clips.title: Fritz salute and flirt
clips.action:
Fritz with his 50's welding goggles on is standing working on a home made rocket that stands 8 ft tall .
Fritz raises his arm stiff straight upwards at 45 degrees, hand flat, PALM DOWN.
and says: “Heil!" 
Then frustrarted, he fights with himself, trying to drag his extended arm down with his other hand.

clips.title: Rocket fizzes, Candy reacts
clips.action:
Fritz's rocket pops and fizzes.
Cut to Candy backing away, anxious.
clips.dialog: Candy talking straight to camera, into her micrphone: “Candy Jones… I am not sooisidle.”

clips.title: Neighbour complaint
clips.location: Neighbours yard, Pasadena plants, palm trees.
clips.action:
Neighbour points angrily. 
Cut to goat in a tree, bleating.
clips.dialog: Neighbour angrily: “I found Maizy in a tree when he blew up his shed!”

clips.title: Fritz rolls rocket
clips.action: Fritz pulls rocket on home made trolley out of doorway of barn
clips.dialog: Fritz: “Countdown to launch, mine furer.”

clips.title: Candy as Arlene persona
clips.action: Candy flips into sly Arlene persona, hair wild.
clips.dialog: Candy (as Arlene) speaking into her 50s microphone: “Men with big rockets…”

clips.title: Beauty beat ritual
clips.action: Seen from far above, looking down at the garden, a beautiful shot of the Rocket pointing directly at camera, centred in a pentagram, 60's hippie girls perform a magic ritual dance, Jack, Fritz, Candy dancing around it on the ground
clips.dialog: Sounds of the wind

clips.title: Countdown & liftoff
clips.action: Jack pushes buttons on the makeshift launch control. Then presses a big red button. The rocket fires. Lifts slowly upwards. Fritz raises his arm stiff straight upwards at 20 degrees, hand flat, PALM DOWN..
clips.dialog: Fritz: “Abhauen!”

clips.title: Anchor cutaway
clips.action: Chet the anchor turns to camera, flat.
clips.dialog: Chet: “NASA denies any involvement.”

clips.title: Rocket arcs, goat bleats
clips.action: The homemade rocket is firing 10ft up in the air. Camera follows Rocket still firing upwards, then it jets off course, arcing in a tight arc until its heads back towards the ground.

clips.title: Explosion & crater
clips.action: The Rocket hits the goat and explodes; forming a mushroom cloud, leaving a crater where the goat was standing.
clips.dialog: Explosion

clips.title: Fritz ash salute
clips.action: Fritz covered in ash, salutes automatically.
clips.dialog: Fritz: “Hile…?”

clips.title: Candy dusted sign-off
clips.action: Candy covered in dust, deadpan to mic.
clips.dialog: Candy: “The space race just had an unscheduled rapid disassembly. Candy Jones, Ultra Radio…”

clips.title: Handler briefing
clips.action:
Handler addresses and off-screen audience in smoky room.
He stands in front of a projector screen, the projection screen fills his background, it has a mugshot of Candy, the image plays across his face.
clips.dialog: Handler: "Castro has closed all the doors. Arlene is our hail mary. We get cocktail diplomacy or lose another agent."

clips.title: Castro UN speech
clips.action: Castro speaks from podium, shot identical to newsreel.
clips.dialog: Castro: "The US Government considers it has the right to infiltrate and subvert us…"

clips.title: Candy car interior
clips.location:
Interior:, Candys_Porsche, Candy sits in the driver’s seat, scale realistic.
Outside car:, Presidential_Palace_Ext_1960, Through the windscreen we see the palace entrance and the press throng outside.
clips.style: Light from paparazzi flashbulbs flickers across Candy’s face.
clips.camera:
CAMERA: Wide angle, interior.
Locked passenger-seat POV shot, looking at Candy from close beside her. Her face dominates left of frame.
clips.action:
Candy leans forward slightly over the wheel, tense, speaking to herself. Her auburn hair lit by flashbulbs. Olive-green satin halter dress catches glints of light. Her expression shifts between determination and dread.

Background stays fixed: palace, flag, and crowd visible through windscreen.

Car interior lighting: dim, moody, lights on the dash, with flickering external flashes.

Camera does not cut. Continuous single shot.
clips.dialog:
CANDY: "How to get an interview with a dictator..."
"If I don’t land this, I’m toast… or worse." She pulls a theatrical wincing face.

clips.title: Palace exterior wide
clips.location:
Presidential_Palace_Ext_1960, Secret police standing on the red carpet, and guests ascending the steps towards the entrance. 
White Cadillac limo: Late-50s Cadillac Fleetwood 75 limousine, chrome detailing, dark tinted windows, driver in white uniform.
clips.camera: Medium Wide, centred on entrance, from other side of access road. Square, looking straight at entrance.
clips.action:
1. Candy drives in from screen right to left. Her Porsche rolls to a stop exactly centred on the entrance.
2. She is realistic human scale inside the hard top coupe(NOT A CONVERTIBLE). Olive-green halter-neck satin dress, deep auburn hair.
3. After 1–2 seconds pause, the large white Cadillac limo drives in behind the Porsche from the same side.
4. The limo does not brake early. It collides nose-to-tail with the Porsche using realistic vehicle physics: impact compresses the Porsche rear, jerks the Porsche forward.
5. Candy’s head and body whip sharply back on impact, showing visible whiplash.
6. The Porsche is pushed fully off screen left, out of frame.
7. The Cadillac continues rolling forward and comes to a stop, parked perfectly centred in front of the red-carpeted entrance, dominating the frame.

clips.title: Palace exterior wide
clips.camera: Close up, tracking left to right, behind the cameraman
clips.action: Chet Valetine speaking direct to the tv camera, is talking into a 50's microphone he's holding, and saying "Tensions are high at the Presidential Palace tonight in Havana. Foreign press are not allowed inside…”

clips.title: Candy arrival car
clips.camera: Framing Candy's Porsche, seeing Candy through the driver's window, seen from the pavement. Reverse shot from building entrance.
clips.action: Candy's Porsche with Candy in it, is parked at the pavement. Candy inside the car, is looking furious. A secret police gaurd approaches to open the drivers door. Chet Valentine reporting behind him.

clips.title: Blue heels step
clips.action: Candy’s black suede stiletto heel with diamond ankle strap, and toe straps, touches red carpet, from the doorway of the Porsche 956

clips.title: Nordic entrance
clips.action: The Nordic’s white stilettos with diamond andkle bracelet, and legs step out of the white limo onto the red carpet; Camera pulls back to see the Nordic leaving the car. Candy in the background furious and frazzled.

clips.title: Candy Chet interview
clips.location: Presidential_Palace_Ext_1960, On the red carpet, cubans behind Chet photo-bombing the interview.
clips.action: Candy being interviewed by Chet Valentine in a tux for Ultra TV.
clips.dialog:
Chet: "Candy Jones – Your shows cancelled, you got no invite, no options. "
Cut to Candy saying: "Hold my beer."

clips.title: Still holding your beer
clips.action: Chet Valentine in a tux is holding a beer, talking to Candy still wearing the fruit hat. As she lights a cigar, some grapes falling in the beer.
clips.dialog: Chet looking theatrically ironic / accusatory: "I'm still holding your beer."

clips.title: Nordic invitation
clips.action:
The Nordic shows her invitation to the secret police and they check it.
Candy appears next to the Nordic, looking exagerated awkward, the Guards look at her.
Then Candy links arms with the Nordic who Nordic looks alarmed.
Candy grins as they walk in together, the Nordic looking at Candy.
clips.dialog: The Nordic gives her a blank half-lidded look...

clips.title: Secret police check guest list
clips.action: Two guards on the gate are checking the guest list. They look up alarmed.
clips.dialog:
One speaks into a 50's walkie talkie in Spanish, "
Alerta. Todo el personal."

clips.title: Party tracking shot
clips.action: Camera follows Candy weaving through crowd
clips.dialog: Candy grabs a martini from a passing waiter, comments and laughs as she passes people, who are surprised by her. Behind her The secret police point at her.

clips.title: Spotlight gag
clips.action: Moving fast, Candy looks desperately around. Then sees a bowl of fruit on a table of Cuban Elites
clips.dialog:
Candy grabs the bowl of fruit. 
The Cuban elite guests raise their hands in theatrical shock.

clips.title: Spotlight gag
clips.character: Candy_Jones, Candy_Meets_Castro, wearing a flamboyant Carmen Miranda-style fruit hat (bananas, grapes, tropical fruit piled high)
clips.action:
Candy is putting fruit on her head.
A single powerful theatre spotlight suddenly turns on from behind the camera, framing her in with the fruit on her head.
Spotlight beam lights up her skin and fruit on her head - the background cast in shadow
clips.dialog:
Candy reacts wide-eyed, theatrical look of surprise.

After a beat, she gives an awkward, exaggerated stage grin, embarrassed at the attention.

clips.title: The Band
clips.action: A salsa mambo jazz band, including drummer, bongos, electric guitar, maracas, sax, base. The band members are characatures of Cuban jazz musicians mostly old but very proficient. Dressed in stylish cuban evening costume with lots of accessories. The band members are all looking towards the camera expectantly... then they all turn to their instruments, and start a jazz number...
clips.dialog: And the band peform mambo jazz number.

clips.title: Spotlight gag
clips.dialog:
With fruit piled on her head like a Carmen Miranda, Candy breaks into theatrical singing, while she does a seductive dance - undulating her hips, and undulating her arms seductively above her head, and around her body. 
The lyrics that she is singing with exaggerated theatrical mouth movements are:

"Don't think. Just do.
Ba-na-na-na-na republic!
The end of me. The end of you?
Ba-na-na-na-na republic!"

The party goers crowd around her to dance around her.

clips.title: Castro reaction
clips.location: Presidential_Palace_Int_Ballroom, plush booth, drinks and bottles on the table.
clips.action: Castro is sitting with his wife and the Nordic, and other Cuban leaders. Castro with cigar in his mouth is grinning and clapping; his wife glares; the Nordic looks bored.

clips.title: Guards advance
clips.action: Secret police surge forward to grab Candy who is still wearing the fruit on her head.

clips.title: Castro cigar gift
clips.action: Castro steps down, approaches Candy, while Candy give a theatrical cute pose and pulls a face. Castro hands Candy a cigar.
clips.dialog: Castro: "I can’t be alone with you without my lawyer."

clips.title: Candy lights cigar
clips.action:
Candy lights cigar, exhales smoke, slides off the cigar band.
Close-up of the cigar band on Candy’s hand, showing handwritten number inside the band.

clips.title: Rain and whineTest Edit
clips.action: Rain falls heavily, fixed camera, headlights glimmer.

clips.title: Candy phone call
clips.character: Candy_Jones, wearing silk kimono ready for bed.
clips.location: Cuban Grand Hotel, lavish colonial style, white muslin full length curtains moving in light breeze, full height double windows open out on a stone balcony, tropical pot plants, subdued lighitng from a deco sidelight.
clips.action:
1.Candy's face, biting her bottom lip. She's holidng a black 50's telephone to hear ear. The moon through the window, over her shoulder. 
2. She says in a low slow seductive voice "Feedell?" 
3. Coming from the other end of the phone there's a low male static-y cuban voice , saying "Candi Joans"

clips.title: Rain and whine
clips.action: Rain falls heavily, fixed camera, headlights glimmer.

clips.title: VO Lies intro
clips.action: Rain falls heavily, fixed camera, headlights glimmer, wind gusts.
clips.dialog: VO cinema style: "It’s 2025 and we’ve heard enough lies."

clips.title: Roswell crash
clips.action: Saucer streaks through storm clouds and crashes into the ground, gouging a long groove debrit trail in the ground, dirt flying everywhere.

clips.title: Wreckage moves
clips.action: Smoke drifting, debris metal and earth, something moves in the wreckage.

clips.title: VO Team vow
clips.action: Team at table, talking to each other, all stop talking, and look over at something behind the camera.
clips.dialog: VO cinema style: "Four citizen journalists vowed to find something real."

clips.title: Bubble Tea boy spotted
clips.action: Team glances toward Bubble Tea Boy watching them. Men in black staring back at the camera, sitting at another table behind him.

clips.title: Corridor search
clips.action: Team advances with torches walking stealthily away from us, down the corridor, the beams of their torches searching ahead of them.

clips.title: Hacker interview
clips.action: Hacker interviews a nervous kid.
clips.dialog: Hacker: "Tell me what you saw!"

clips.title: Handler prep
clips.action: Handler is in his study briefing the team on a laptop, on a video chat.
clips.dialog: Handler: "Are you ready for this?"

clips.title: Team reactions
clips.location: In a pine forest, night, lit from the car floodlights.
clips.action: Team looking over their shoulders, tense glances into the floodlights behind the camera.

clips.title: Giger counter scan
clips.action: Albino Asian sweeps Geiger counter over a street scene, street lighting, broken glass, crime scene tape, at night.

clips.title: No access
clips.action: “No Access” tape flapping, hazmat team moves.

clips.title: Baby hand signal
clips.action: Baby makes strange hand signal.

clips.title: Alien window
clips.action: Alien hand presses suddenly against fogged glass of a hospital door porthole.

clips.title: Believer interview
clips.action: Believer lit by single lamp during interview with two plain clothes officials.
clips.dialog: Plainclothes Agent: "They only release what they want us to know."

clips.title: VO theories
clips.action: City shots with alien craft glimpsed in odd places, a tenement garden, a car park, a sports field at night, in the woods.
clips.dialog: VOm cinema style: “Sightings are cover stories. Why do they come here?

clips.title: Candy at UFO sign
clips.action: Candy stands beneath neon UFO sign flickering “10th Anniversary of the Weather Balloon.” Wind blows her trench coat.
clips.dialog:
Candy_Jones: "It’s been ten years since a weather balloon came down in a cow field."
"In Roswell New Mexico - THAT's an event of high strangeness!!"

clips.title: VO distraction
clips.action: Congress hearing B-roll, cctv
clips.dialog: VO cinema style: “These hearings are a distraction.”

clips.title: VO Real
clips.location: The Hunters HQ lab, server rack, workstations, instruments, strip lights
clips.action: Team reacting with shock, lights flickering.
clips.dialog: VO cinema style: “But they were not ready for how real…”

clips.title: Team fear
clips.action: Team stands terrified, staring into dark.

clips.title: Chet intro broadcast
clips.action: Chet addresses viewers through grainy broadcast feed.
clips.dialog:
Chet_Valentine: "Candy Jones is missing, and we’re going through her tapes looking for clues…"
Pointing to the invisible location of the comment button on Tiktok - to right-middle of screen. "Comment with tips about her disappearance."

clips.title: Date in Roswell
clips.action: Chet leans into camera, smirking.
clips.dialog: Chet_Valentine: "She had a date in Roswell. Tall, dark, and handsome? Or Tall Grey and anomalous?"

clips.title: Candy at UFO sign
clips.action: Candy stands beneath neon UFO sign flickering “10th Anniversary of the Weather Balloon.” Wind blows her trench coat.
clips.dialog:
Candy_Jones: "It’s been ten years since a weather balloon came down in a cow field."
"In Roswell New Mexico - THAT's an event of high strangeness!!"

clips.title: Farmhand interview
clips.action: Candy interviews rancher’s goofy son who is wearing a tinfoil hat.
clips.dialog:
Farmhand_Son: "Ain’t never seen a weather balloon dig a ditch a mile long."
CUT TO CLOSE UP OF FARMHAND SON LOOKING ALARMED...
"And have little green men in it." He says.

clips.title: Aliens in balloon
clips.camera: Medium_Close_Comedy looking up from the ground
clips.action: Silver hightech 60’s weather balloon array of three balloons [follow reference image 2 exactly], with a basket hanging below it, with three (3) small grey aliens [reference image 1] looking down at us. Floating overhead, against a clear sky.
clips.dialog:
Off-screen, Candy voice over: "Stop them they're getting away!"
Alien 1 in the balloon basket - in a comic high-pitched alien voice: "Those APES look DANGEROUS!!"

clips.title: Cows in circle
clips.action: Candy and the farmhand walk up the pasture; the cows are standing in a perfect circle.
clips.dialog:
Candy says to the cows: "Take me to your leader!"
Cut to a medium close-up of black bull full face, and he lets out a comical "mooooooo!"

clips.title: Soldiers still out there
clips.action: Farmhand nods toward horizon; distant figures in hazmat suits sweep the land.
clips.dialog:
Farmhand_Son: "Army guys are still out there… looking for the keys."
Candy: "To start the weather balloon?"

clips.title: Flashback crash montage
clips.action: Flying saucer crash site. UFO is stuck in the ground at an angle, in earth piled up by the crash. Flood lightning, army jeeps, 60's hazmat suits moving small body bags, men in suits.

clips.title: Heroic Jack Metal-detecting
clips.action: Heroic 1950s framing: Jack in 50's hazmat suit with perspex sphere helmet, 50's metal detector, sweeping the ground with intense concentration, under lightning sky, cows watching.
clips.dialog:
Cut to closeup of Candy's face looking cheeky: "Why are you vacuuming the desert?"
Zoom into close up of Jack's face inside the helmet.
Jack says: "Cleaning up weather balloon shit."

clips.title: Detector finds object
clips.action: Detector beeps wildly. Jack, in the hazmat suit, crouches down and digs the ground, and uncovers a shiny chrome 1950s toaster.

clips.title: Parsons reveal
clips.action: Hazmat man unzips hood — reveal Jack, exasperated.
clips.dialog: Jack: "I'm a rocket scientist, and they’ve got me !!..."

clips.title: Flying toaster
clips.dialog:
The toaster levitates between them, humming, and making an garbled beeps and hoots. 
Candy: "Light lunch anyone?"
Jack studies the toaster curioiusly.
Jack: "It's a rebel appliance!"

clips.title: Help me I'm so hungry
clips.action:
Viewed from side on, Candy half-crouches to push an un-packaged Pop-tart into the toaster. 
Cut to very close up of her hand with painted nails putting a pop-tart into the slot of the toaster floating in front of her.
clips.dialog: Candy speaking to the toaster: "Help me, I’m so hungry… you’re my only hope."

clips.title: Pop-tart catch
clips.action: Toaster DINGS — flaming pop-tart shoots into air; and Candy reaches to catch it, while Jack [no longer wearing his helmet] recoils.

clips.title: Weird stare tag
clips.action: Candy eating the Pop-tart and Jake stare at each other, then the hovering toaster.
clips.dialog: Jack pointing to the pop-tart and looking intense: "This could have military applications!"

clips.title: Aliens in balloon
clips.action: Silver hightech 60’s weather balloon array of three balloons [follow reference image 2 exactly], with a basket hanging below it, with three (3) small grey aliens [reference image 1] looking at each other unemotionally. Floating high against a clear sky.
clips.dialog:
Alien 2 in the balloon basket - in a high-pitched metalic alien voice: "These Apes have big rockets!!" 
Alien 3 in the balloon basket - in a high-pitched metalic alien voice: "But they're aimed at themselves!"

clips.title: Candy feeds toaster
clips.action: Candy slides bread into the levitating toaster as it glows.
clips.dialog: Toaster: "Help me… I’m so hungry… you’re my only hope." Candy_Jones: "Even breakfast is classified."

clips.title: Pop tart launch
clips.action: Toaster DINGS and fires a flaming pop-tart upward as they recoil.
clips.dialog: Jack_Parsons: "This could have military applications!"

clips.title: Complicated look
clips.action: Candy and Parsons stare at each other, then the hovering toaster.
clips.dialog: Candy_Jones: "Chet, tell the audience I’m seeing someone." Jack_Parsons: "It’s complicated."

clips.title: Title Slide Fractured Mirror
clips.action: Stark black background with a fractured mirror. Candy (reference image 1), age 32, elegant, blonde, 1970s evening wear, is raising red lipstick to her face. In the mirror she stares into the eyes of herself as Arlene (reference image 2), wearing same clothes, but shoulder-length brunette wig, and dark eye-shadow. Dramatic side lighting casting deep shadows, high contrast composition emphasizing psychological split.

clips.title: Timeline Graphic Fade
clips.action: Horizontal timeline graphic showing 1940s pin-up glamour photos fading left to right into 1960s Cold War shadowy espionage scenes, then to 1970s dimly lit bedroom horror, integrated mood board elements with stills of classy period details like vintage dresses and radios, soft gradient lighting from warm sepia to cool blues, balanced composition with central focus on Candy's evolving portraits.

clips.title: Archival Photos Overlay
clips.action: Collage of archival photos including Candy's pin-up magazine covers and USO tour images juxtaposed with declassified MKULTRA documents and Church Committee headlines, subtle horror overlay of ethereal owl motifs symbolizing control floating in shadows, vintage grainy texture with low-key lighting highlighting text and faces, asymmetrical composition for tension.

clips.title: Mood Board Collage
clips.action: Collage mood board featuring elegant 1950s-1970s costumes and sets inspired by The Outfit, distorted mirrors for Videodrome body-horror effects, endless hotel hallways evoking The Shining's isolation dread, and graphic noir panels like Sin City for surreal missions, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting with high contrast shadows, grid composition arranging elements dynamically.

clips.title: Bedroom Hypnosis
clips.action: 1972. Intimate bedroom scene with Candy, age 42, is lying on bed during hypnosis, John Nebel leaning in attentively, dim bedside lamp lighting casting long shadows on walls, composition centered on Candy's relaxed yet tense face with subtle warped reflections in a nearby mirror.

clips.title: Mirror Portal
clips.action: in Jensen's lab, the mirror is a portal into her alter ego Arlene. Anxious, Candy aged 32, touches fingertips with Arlene through the cracked mirror, as her reflection Arlene, looks at her pityingly.

clips.title: Asian Streets
clips.action: Narrow Asian street at night. Very crowded street food market. Chaotic mishmash of food stalls, 1960's. Arlene in open trench coat weaving through the neon-lit crowd, holding a silenced silver Walther PPK down low, wet pavement reflecting lights, composition with leading lines drawing eye to her figure amid escalating tension elements like local gangsters tailing her.

clips.title: Asian Club
clips.action: Interior. Arlene, age 30, entering an five star, luxury, 60’s Taiwanese night club, elegant elaborate traditional decoration, carved woodwork, paper screens, dark, lanterns, candles, elegant clients and women in faintly traditional taiwanese cocktail dresses. Arlene is dressed for the evening, in ultra elegant bronze silk far east haut couture, elbow length gloves, silk pencil skirt cocktail dress, high heels. Makeup 60's cat eyed eyeliner. Arlene at the lavish entrance, framed by heavy vintage embroidered drapes, welcomed by a super elegant Taiwanese woman front of house hostess.

clips.title: Asian Street Hypnosis
clips.action: 1960's Taiwanese street food market. Very narrow street. Neons and canopies cluttered together. Arlene age 32, in open trench coat, silenced silver Walther PPK held low, pushing her way through the tight neon-lit crowd, escalating tension elements like local gangster pursuers. In the foreground surreally is Candy's bed from the bedroom [see reference image], and on it John Nebel holding a 60's home microphone out, watching Arlene as she passes, not looking at him, with the crowd, who seem to be walking past the bed.

clips.title: Cast Headshots
clips.action: Collage of headshots and mood images: Jessica Chastain-type actress as Candy/Arlene duality with blonde to brunette transition, director bio photo in thoughtful pose, team logos integrated, soft studio lighting with subtle shadows, grid composition for professional presentation.

clips.title: Market Pie Charts
clips.action: Pie charts illustrating horror genre box office in billions, comp grosses for The Shining and Videodrome, festival badges like Sundance and Cannes overlaid, clean modern lighting with vibrant colors on charts, centered composition for clarity and impact.

clips.title: Budget Breakdown Pie
clips.action: Breakdown pie chart showing $3-5M budget allocation (60% production, 20% cast, etc.), adjacent timeline Gantt chart for project phases, professional blue-toned lighting, balanced composition with charts side by side.

clips.title: Distribution Funnel Graphic
clips.action: Funnel graphic depicting distribution path from festivals to theatrical/VOD to streaming, with hypothetical partner logos like A24 and Neon, bright funnel-shaped lighting gradients, vertical composition emphasizing flow.

clips.title: CTA Mirror Shatter
clips.action: Bold CTA text 'Invest in the Unseen—Bid Now' overlaid on a shattering mirror effect, fragments showing subtle horror elements like owl eyes, dramatic backlighting with rays piercing cracks, centered composition for high impact, QR code in corner.

clips.title: Candy Jones is a cover… My name is Arlene Grant…
clips.location: 1960s interior, desk with vintage reel-to-reel tape recorder, handwritten label “Tape 216 [NO COPY]: Larry Edison, Hypnotist”
clips.style: Noir newsroom tone, subtle film grain, moody shadows
clips.camera: Cinematic close-up, shallow depth of field
clips.action: Tape reels spin slowly
clips.dialog: Candy Jones is a cover… My name is Arlene Grant…

clips.title: Breaking news — Candy Jones is missing. And what she left behind…
clips.location: Early-60s local Miami TV news studio
clips.style: Noir newsroom grit, cinematic film grain, surreal colour flashes
clips.action: Studio lights snap on, smoke curls
clips.dialog: Breaking news — Candy Jones is missing. And what she left behind… is even stranger.

clips.title: Fashion model and Queen of the paranormal…
clips.action: Candy walks catwalk in gold catsuit
clips.dialog: Fashion model and Queen of the paranormal - host of late night show News of High Strangeness… Candy did not show up for work today.

clips.title: Entertaining the troops
clips.location: Vietnam-era landing zone, UH-1 Huey helicopter
clips.style: Dramatic cinematic composition, high contrast, 1960s film grain
clips.action: Candy waves and laughs from open helicopter door

clips.title: Candy in trench coat, coffee, tin foil hat
clips.style: Noir newsroom grit, subtle surreal absurdity
clips.camera: Cut from wide to tight, telephoto on face
clips.action: Candy walks briskly through studio, coffee in hand

clips.title: She’s never missed a show…
clips.location: Retro radio booth, empty, steaming coffee cup, scattered reels
clips.style: Noir newsroom grit, saturated but tasteful colour, film grain
clips.action: Camera lingers on tape machine
clips.dialog: She’s never missed a show. Turns up… almost on time everyday… Candy Time. Late for the interview. On time for the story. It’s a mystery. But this afternoon… the mystery is Candy. And we found THIS on her tape machine…

clips.title: My name is Arlene Grant…
clips.location: Dark radio booth, spinning tape reels
clips.style: Noir shadows, surreal flashes, cigarette smoke
clips.action: Tape spins as Candy speaks calmly
clips.dialog: My name is Arlene Grant. I am an agent of the CIA. I operated in 22 countries, undercover as a pin-up…

clips.title: Gave me goosebumps. And not the fun kind.
clips.action: Chet leans back, deadpan
clips.dialog: Gave me goosebumps. And not the fun kind.

clips.title: We are now looking for clues in her old tapes…
clips.location: Storeroom with shelves of reel-to-reel tapes
clips.style: Noir newsroom grit, saturated colour, film grain
clips.action: Camera passes labelled tapes
clips.dialog: We are now looking for clues in her old tapes - her meetings with people of high strangeness. And we’ll be airing clips of The Candy Jones tapes - to see if they trigger any anonymous tips as to her whereabouts.

clips.title: Candy Jones is no stranger to strangeness…
clips.location: 1960s farmyard, vintage tractor, novelty saucer ride
clips.action: Farmer gestures wildly, Candy laughs
clips.dialog: Candy Jones is no stranger to strangeness. Candy had a date with a farmer who said a flying saucer crashed in his cow field…

clips.title: Nothing strange about that.
clips.action: Chet smirks, cigarette raised
clips.dialog: Nothing strange about that.

clips.title: In a town called Roswell…
clips.location: Aerial view of dusty small-town street, retro cars
clips.action: Camera glides over town
clips.dialog: In a town called Roswell…

clips.title: The government said it was a weather balloon…
clips.action: Witness leans forward, intense
clips.dialog: The government said it was a weather balloon. I never seen a balloon hit the ground, and leave a trail of scrap metal a mile long? Or have little green men inside?

clips.title: …can you trust them to find a missing pin-up…
clips.action: Chet presses closer to microphone
clips.dialog: …and if you can’t trust your government about saucers from outer space, can you trust them to find a missing pin-up… Journalist?

clips.title: The witness said there was flying saucers…
clips.action: Cowboy gestures wildly
clips.dialog: The witness said there was flying saucers circling like flies on sh— or is it the moonshine in his eyes…

clips.title: You’re Arlene Grant aincha?
clips.action: Candy shifts from confused to flat
clips.dialog: You’re Arlene Grant aincha? Candy Jones. Ultra Radio…

clips.title: TEST_1765786778223

libraryItems.name: Candy_Jones
libraryItems.description:
CANDY: A hauntingly beautiful woman in her mid-20s, c. 1950.
Face: Green eyes, shoulder length wavy 50's styled auburn hair, high cheekbones, straight long nose, strong Cupid’s bow; lips medium‑full. 
Young, gorgeous, smart, with non-classical aristocratic features. Poised, camera‑aware, cool.
Voice: American educated 50's Pennsylvania accent and theatrical delivery.

libraryItems.name: Candy_Rocketman
libraryItems.description: CANDY's WARDROBE: Styled in retro-futurist 1950s fashion — sharp collar, cinched waist, simple fitted, two-tone uniform dress: cream colored short-sleeves with pointed collar above the bust, and red section covering bust and extending down into a fitted midsection. The outfit has a tailored, vintage look with bold color blocking that accentuates the waist. Makeup featuring classic red lipstick and subtle eyeliner. Cinematic retro aesthetic.

libraryItems.name: Chet_Valentine
libraryItems.description:
CHET: Mid‑30s newsroom anchor; Jack Lord‑style quiff, sharp cheekbones; cheap 1960s suit and skinny tie. Facial hair: clean‑shaven. 
Demeanor: intense stare, deadpan wit.

libraryItems.name: Ultra_Radio_Studio
libraryItems.description:
Candy’s booth at Ultra Radio. C. 1960
Classic 50’s mic in front of her, metal Ultra Radio plaque on the front of it, capitals "ULTRA RADIO" stacked, with black enamel background / infill.
Anglepoise screen left, the only light. 
Behind her: A chaotic pinboard filled with yellowed clippings, vintage concert tickets, passport photos, telex messages, and CIA documents, all linked with red string - fills the background.

libraryItems.name: Anime_Cel
libraryItems.description: Anime cel shading; crisp black line art; high‑contrast flat colors; limited motion blur; lensing like Demon Slayer / One Piece.

libraryItems.name: Noir_1960s
libraryItems.description: Noir newsroom grit; saturated but tasteful color; 1960s film grain; hard key and deep shadows.

libraryItems.name: CloseUp_Dramatic
libraryItems.description: Straight, square on, on face, slow push‑in; shallow depth‑of‑field; slight low angle to intensify.

libraryItems.name: Crash_Zoom
libraryItems.description: Rapid crash zoom to subject; brief whip‑pan feel; handheld micro‑shake allowed.

libraryItems.name: Jack_Parsons
libraryItems.description: JACK: Eccentric 1950s rocket engineer. 30 yr old, Intense, visionary. Dark hair, short back and sides, curly eraserhead style bourfant quiff. Pencil moustache. Grease-stained white shirt. Blue suspenders.

libraryItems.name: Fritz_Dornberger
libraryItems.description: FRITZ: Comic Germanic mad scientist neighbour. Messy white hair, lab coat, tool belt, Converse sneakers. Welding goggles.

libraryItems.name: Rocketman_Shed
libraryItems.description: Interior. 50's era. Dusty barn, workshop for rockets. Jet parts. Blueprints, chalk board with formulas and occult chalk sigils on walls.

libraryItems.name: Backyard_Launch
libraryItems.description: Backyard garden, pasadena native plants, scrapped inventions scarttered around, palm trees in distance, pentagram drawn in dirt charred launch patch, hippy girls dancing.

libraryItems.name: Newsroom_1950s
libraryItems.description: Mid-century newsroom desk with ticker tape, glass ashtray, harsh overhead light.

libraryItems.name: Noir_1960s
libraryItems.description: Cinematic depth-of-field, noir grit, 1960s film grain, hard key shadows, slight analog glitch.

libraryItems.name: CloseUp_Dramatic
libraryItems.description: Straight-on close-up, shallow depth of field.

libraryItems.name: Medium_Close
libraryItems.description: Waist-up framing, slight push-in.

libraryItems.name: Wide
libraryItems.description: Full-body framing, wide context.

libraryItems.name: Drone_Down
libraryItems.description: Very high descending shot, looking down on location, and descending, centred on the key object or action.

libraryItems.name: Candy_Meets_Castro
libraryItems.description: CANDY WARDROBE: Olive green satin cocktail dress in a fitted pencil-skirt silhouette, floor-length with a deep halter neckline. Satin fabric gleams subtly under light, clinging elegantly to the figure. Bodice plunges low, framed with delicate silver beaded trim that runs down the neckline. Skirt tapers narrow, with a small slit at the back for movement. Accessories: diamond drop earrings, slim bracelet, silver pendant on a chain. Makeup: bold red lipstick, subtle eyeliner, hair styled in loose 1950s waves swept to one side. Diamond drop earrings, bold red lipstick.
libraryItems.notes: Distinct from Candy’s radio or Rocketman looks; reusable for future palace/party settings.

libraryItems.name: The_Nordic
libraryItems.description: The Nordic: Striking albino woman in her late 20s. Long, straight white hair with no wave. Skin pale, almost luminous. Wardrobe: ice-white slit pencil skirt, retro-futurist chic; fitted jacket; white 1950s airhostess hat with no trim, graphics, or badges; white 4-inch stilettos; white toenails. Demeanor: cold, enigmatic, half-lidded gaze, moves with gliding precision.
libraryItems.notes: Archetypal figure recurring across the island mythos.

libraryItems.name: CIA_Handler
libraryItems.description:
Mid-40s man, cropped dark hair, severe jawline. 
Wardrobe: horn-rimmed glasses with cyan lenses, plain grey CIA suit, loosened tie. 
Demeanor: flat, reflective, speaks with detached authority.
libraryItems.notes: Appears in multiple CIA flashback briefings.

libraryItems.name: Secret_Police
libraryItems.description:
Cuban secret police: late 50s. Assorted moustache and beard combos. Assorted builds.
Wardrobe: black suit, crisp black shirts, narrow red ties, black 1950s sunglasses. Black AK-47's. Leather strap of a shoulder holster inside the jacket. 
Demeanor: disciplined, stone-faced, menacing.
libraryItems.notes: Guards throughout palace exterior and interior.

libraryItems.name: Castro_Wife
libraryItems.description: CASTROS WIFE: Mid-30s Cuban woman, elegant. Wardrobe: fitted cocktail dress in black satin, pearl necklace, hair pinned in 1960 updo. Demeanor: stiff, watchful, jealous gaze.
libraryItems.notes: Recurs in party and lounge shots.

libraryItems.name: Presidential_Palace_Ext_1960
libraryItems.description: Presidential Palace: Havana’s Presidential Palace exterior at night. Huge Cuban flag hanging sideways, the red chevron at the top pointing down above entrance, 6 wide stone steps up from a wide pavement, red carpet, access road running across the front of the pagvement. On the pavement Chet Valentine in tux talking to 60's tv camera, Cuban state tv crew, searchlights pointing straight up to the sky, velvet ropes, press crowd, flashbulbs.

libraryItems.name: Red_Carpet_Gate
libraryItems.description: At the arched entrance, secret police guards check the guests invitations.
libraryItems.notes: Used for invitation and Candy slipping past.

libraryItems.name: Presidential_Palace_Int_Ballroom
libraryItems.description: INTERIOR: Havana’s Presidential Palace ball room, Lavish 1960 interior. Marble columns, chandeliers, gilded trim, dancers, fire-eater, waiters with trays. Subdued club lighting. Crowded, decadent atmosphere.

libraryItems.name: Candys_Porsche
libraryItems.description: CANDYS PORSCHE: 1959 Porsche 356 A (T2) 1600 Super, coupe, hard top, NOT A CONVERTIBLE. Bodywork in buffed bare aluminium. Red leather interior.

libraryItems.name: Newsreel_BW_1960
libraryItems.description: High-contrast monochrome, visible film grain, gate weave, subtle scratches, archival look.

libraryItems.name: Low_Angle_Heroic
libraryItems.description: Camera angled sharply up from below, enlarging subject, high-contrast shadows across face, dramatic manga exaggeration.

libraryItems.name: Tracking_Shot
libraryItems.description: Handheld or dolly tracking through crowd, shallow depth of field, subject center-framed, noir grit.
libraryItems.notes: Used in party sequence following Candy.

libraryItems.name: Insert_Close
libraryItems.description: Macro close-up, object fills frame, shallow focus, vignette edges, noir panel-like emphasis.

libraryItems.name: Farm_Night
libraryItems.description: New Mexico. Rain-soaked rural farm at night with mud, barn, farm house, and faint vehicle headlights in the distance.

libraryItems.name: Desert_Night
libraryItems.description: Open New Mexico scrubland with sand, cactus, yucca, and storm clouds lit by lightning.

libraryItems.name: Cafe_Night
libraryItems.description: Small urban UK café with strip lighting, chrome fittings, and window reflections of rain.

libraryItems.name: Corridor_Night
libraryItems.description: Industrial corridor with peeling paint, dripping pipes, dim torchlight.

libraryItems.name: Field_Night
libraryItems.description: Open field with mist and floodlights; night sky overhead.

libraryItems.name: Basement
libraryItems.description: Low-lit basement with clutter, exposed wiring, and damp concrete walls.

libraryItems.name: Van_Night
libraryItems.description: Dimly lit vehicle interior with instrument glow and rain on windows.

libraryItems.name: Cinematic_Dark
libraryItems.description: Dramatic low-key lighting with high contrast, cool tones, and deep shadows, urban, contemporary, alternative.

libraryItems.name: Documentary_Real
libraryItems.description: Natural handheld realism with muted tones and soft ambient light.

libraryItems.name: Thriller_Tense
libraryItems.description: Moody, suspenseful palette with high contrast, cold blues, tight framing, contemporary.

libraryItems.name: Cinematic_Action
libraryItems.description: Dynamic, high-speed realism with motion blur and dramatic lighting, contemporary.

libraryItems.name: Wide_Establishing
libraryItems.description: Wide frame establishing geography and atmosphere.

libraryItems.name: CloseUp_Atmospheric
libraryItems.description: Close, textured shot capturing rain or emotion with shallow focus.

libraryItems.name: Medium_Close
libraryItems.description: Shoulder-up framing; environmental detail still visible.

libraryItems.name: Tracking_Steady
libraryItems.description: Smooth dolly or gimbal tracking following characters.

libraryItems.name: Montage_Fast
libraryItems.description: Rapid intercut edits with visual rhythm and quick zooms.

libraryItems.name: Wide_Dynamic
libraryItems.description: Expansive framing with fast motion and environmental effects.

libraryItems.name: Hacker
libraryItems.description: Late 20s, female, dark hair under beanie, leather jacket, fingerless gloves, focused.

libraryItems.name: Albino_Asian
libraryItems.description: Pale-skinned woman with platinum hair, calm, analytical, wearing field jacket, holds Geiger counter.

libraryItems.name: Handler
libraryItems.description: 40s, male, military bearing, bomber jacket, cautious intensity.

libraryItems.name: Believer
libraryItems.description: 30s, male, slightly disheveled, haunted eyes, casual jacket, carries notebook.

libraryItems.name: Team
libraryItems.description: Four investigators together: the Skeptic, Believer, Hacker, Albino Asian.

libraryItems.name: Men_In_Black
libraryItems.description: Two men in black suits, white shirts, dark ties, emotionless expressions.

libraryItems.name: Candy_Jones_Roswell
libraryItems.description: Candy, Wardrobe: stylish 50's tan trench coat over knee-length pencil skirt, tailored red retro-futurist stewardess dress.
libraryItems.notes: Default Candy look for noir episodes.

libraryItems.name: Noir_1950s_BMovie
libraryItems.description: Pulp sci-fi tone: heavy film grain, exaggerated chiaroscuro, thunderflash lighting, smoke machine haze. Palette: desaturated with cyan highlights. Visual rhythm: quick cuts, comic-book panels, theatrical shadows.
libraryItems.notes: Default visual mood for NOHS Roswell arc.

libraryItems.name: CloseUp_Dramatic
libraryItems.description: Tight framing, slight lens distortion, film grain accentuating facial highlights. Background blurred with low-angle uplight, emphasising pulp intensity.
libraryItems.notes: For Chet opener, Candy reaction, or reveal shots.

libraryItems.name: Medium_Wide_Static
libraryItems.description: Waist-up to full-body composition, balanced symmetrical framing, static camera on tripod. Atmospheric depth visible behind subjects.
libraryItems.notes: Used for sign and pasture setups.

libraryItems.name: Interview_2Shot_Static
libraryItems.description: Locked tripod framing of two characters mid-chest up, 1950s talk-show feel. Slight backlight halo on reporter’s hair.

libraryItems.name: Hands_Reveal_Object
libraryItems.description: Close on hands manipulating or discovering object; shallow DoF; background bokeh flickers from lab light or desert sun.
libraryItems.notes: Used in toaster discovery, cigar band, prop reveals.

libraryItems.name: Object_Floats
libraryItems.description: Small object levitates or hovers in frame, lit from below, dust drifting around.

libraryItems.name: Character_Deadpan_Quip
libraryItems.description: Character pauses, stares into camera, delivers line flat and ironic.
libraryItems.notes: Used by Candy and Chet across series.

libraryItems.name: Reveal_Scientist
libraryItems.description: Character removes hood or mask to reveal eccentric scientist beneath; camera push-in.

libraryItems.name: Interview_WalkAndTalk
libraryItems.description: Reporter and subject stroll side-by-side while exchanging lines; background movement conveys realism.

libraryItems.name: Ultra_News_Studio
libraryItems.description: Small 1960s local Miami TV station newsroom. Low ceiling with buzzing fluorescent tubes, wood-panel walls, Ultra News logo painted slightly off-center behind desk. Chrome boom mic overhead, bulky cathode cameras on wheeled tripods, cables coiled across scuffed linoleum floor. Lighting: harsh, flat, with faint cigarette haze. Background props: rotary phone, stack of cue cards, wall clock perpetually five minutes slow.
libraryItems.notes: Used for Chet Valentine’s Ultra News segments and broadcast cut-ins.

libraryItems.name: Roswell_Pasture
libraryItems.description: Open New Mexico scrubland with sand, cactus, yucca, and storm clouds.

libraryItems.name: Jack_Parsons_Roswell
libraryItems.description: Jack is wearing a 60's hazmat suit, with a full spherical perspex space helmet, but he will not be holding the torch.

libraryItems.name: Farmhand_Son
libraryItems.description: Good looking farm hand in lumberjack shirt and denim bib overalls.

libraryItems.name: Roswell_Cow_Circle
libraryItems.description: Wide open New Mexico pasture at dusk, ring of cows standing perfectly still in a circular formation. Dust in the air, faint thunderclouds, eerie stillness under flickering light. UFO debris and tire ruts visible around them.
libraryItems.notes: Used for Candy and Farmhand discovery scene; evokes eerie 1950s alien mystery.

libraryItems.name: Farmhand_Son
libraryItems.description: Early 20s rancher type; sunburned skin, strong jaw, naive expression. Wears plaid shirt, denim overalls, and tinfoil hat made from kitchen foil. Demeanor: goofy, awkwardly flirtatious, enamoured with Candy.
libraryItems.notes: Recurring comic-relief archetype for rural Roswell segments.

libraryItems.name: Heroic_Hazmat_Scan
libraryItems.description: Character in bulky 1950s hazmat suit sweeps desert with a metal detector under storm clouds; cinematic low-angle, lightning flashes, cows watching.
libraryItems.notes: Used for Jack Parsons' entrance; parody of pulp sci-fi hero shot.

libraryItems.name: Candy_Jones
libraryItems.description: Glamorous American fashion model woman, age 47, blonde wavy hair, blue eyes, elegant makeup. Elegant, poise, with underlying vulnerability. Styling c.1970.

libraryItems.name: Arlene_Grant
libraryItems.description: Alter ego of Candy. 6 foot tall. Face based accurately on the facial features of the reference image. 60's straight shoulder-length brunette bob wig, dark eye-shadow, dark red lipstick. Harsh facial expression, intense gaze conveying defiance, menace, secretive demeanour.

libraryItems.name: John_Nebel
libraryItems.description: Late night New York radio host, weary yet charismatic face, thoughtful, playful expression. Age 61.

libraryItems.name: Gilbert_Jensen
libraryItems.description: Suave doctor in lab coat, 50s, manipulative smile, authoritative posture in lab settings.

libraryItems.name: Bedroom_1970s
libraryItems.description: Large bedroom 1970's chic luxury apartment on Manhattan's Upper East Side. Double bed, headboard with mirror and 70's Sony TC-142 tape recorder, wood paneling on the walls, dim lamps, cluttered with period items like radio equipment, books and photos. 70's TV. Closets next to bathroom door,

libraryItems.name: Jensen_Lab
libraryItems.description:
Late 60's drab modernist interior. A plain, tidy wooden desk. A late 60's office chair of the same type as the one in front of the desk. Heavy drapes covered the window. Built-in bookshelves lined the wall behind the desk. The shelves directly in back contained only a gooseneck lamp in which a bare bulb burned brightly. The shelves to either side held a few medical reference books. A Webster’s dictionary among them. To the right hung a large wall mirror. The room was dim except for the bare bulb behind the desk. A Tensor lamp on the desk was unlighted, as was a bullet lamp on the wall next to the mirror.

A small adjacent "examination room" is visible through a doorway: high examination table covered with white linen in the center; white cabinet against one wall, contents invisible behind white opaque glass doors; small straight chair. Medical equipment: IV setup, slender plastic tube leading upward to a bottle hanging from a metal stand; syringes and vials implied on desk and in cabinet.

libraryItems.name: Asian_Streets
libraryItems.description: Rain-slicked far east Asian narrow crowded street food market at night.1960's. Neon signs, wet pavement, local people thronging, eating, and walking by shoulder to shoulder.

libraryItems.name: Abstract_Background
libraryItems.description: Minimalist black void with graphic elements, used for titles and overlays.

libraryItems.name: Abstract_Timeline
libraryItems.description: Graphical timeline space, fading eras from sepia to blue tones.

libraryItems.name: Archival_Collage
libraryItems.description: Vintage photo montage background, grainy textures, historical documents.

libraryItems.name: Abstract_Mood_Board
libraryItems.description: Collage-style canvas with film stills and inspirations.

libraryItems.name: Abstract_Graphic
libraryItems.description: Clean data visualization space, charts and diagrams on neutral background.

libraryItems.name: Noir_B&W
libraryItems.description: Black-and-white noir photography, high contrast, deep shadows, vintage film grain.

libraryItems.name: Period_Accurate_50s_70s
libraryItems.description: Realistic 1950s-1970s aesthetic, warm color grading, authentic costumes and props.

libraryItems.name: Graphic_Noir
libraryItems.description: Stylized graphic novel look, bold lines, selective color pops in black-and-white.

libraryItems.name: Psychological_Horror
libraryItems.description: Surreal distortions, eerie color shifts, inspired by Videodrome and The Shining. Render in full colour, even when the reference images are in black and white.

libraryItems.name: Surreal_Transition
libraryItems.description: Dreamlike blending, warped perspectives, fluid morphing effects.

libraryItems.name: Rain_Slicked_Noir
libraryItems.description: Wet, reflective surfaces, neon glows, classic noir atmosphere.

libraryItems.name: Data_Visualization
libraryItems.description: Modern infographic style, clean lines, vibrant charts on subtle backgrounds.

libraryItems.name: Close_Up_50mm
libraryItems.description: Intimate close-up, shallow depth of field f/1.8, focus on face and expressions.

libraryItems.name: Wide_Shot_35mm
libraryItems.description: Broad view, wide angle lens, deep focus to capture environment.

libraryItems.name: Medium_Shot_85mm
libraryItems.description: Waist-up framing, compressed perspective, soft bokeh background.

libraryItems.name: Portrait_Length_85mm
libraryItems.description: Head and shoulders portrait, flattering compression, natural lighting.
